verses.text: \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* God \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* salvation, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* cried day \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w night|strong="H1121"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*.

Let \w my|strong="H3068"\w* prayer enter \w into|strong="H3915"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w presence|strong="H5048"\w*. Turn \w your|strong="H3068"\w* ear \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w cry|strong="H6817"\w*.

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5186"\w* soul \w is|strong="H6440"\w* full \w of|strong="H6440"\w* troubles. \w My|strong="H5186"\w* life draws \w near|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* Sheol.\f + \fr 88:3 \ft Sheol is the place of the dead.\f*

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am counted among \w those|strong="H5315"\w* \w who|strong="H5315"\w* go \w down|strong="H5060"\w* \w into|strong="H2416"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w pit|strong="H7585"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w like|strong="H2416"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w who|strong="H5315"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w no|strong="H5060"\w* help,

set apart \w among|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* dead, \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* slain \w who|strong="H1397"\w* \w lie|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* grave, \w whom|strong="H1397"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w* remember \w no|strong="H1961"\w* \w more|strong="H1961"\w*. They \w are|strong="H1961"\w* cut \w off|strong="H3381"\w* \w from|strong="H3381"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* hand.

\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w laid|strong="H7901"\w* \w me|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H2142"\w* lowest pit, \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H2142"\w* darkest depths.
\w Your|strong="H7896"\w* wrath lies heavily on \w me|strong="H7896"\w*. You have afflicted \w me|strong="H7896"\w* with \w all|strong="H7896"\w* \w your|strong="H7896"\w* waves. \qs Selah.\qs*

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* taken \w my|strong="H3605"\w* friends \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*. \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w an|strong="H5921"\w* abomination \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* am confined, \w and|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* canâ€™t escape.

\w My|strong="H3045"\w* eyes \w are|strong="H3045"\w* dim \w from|strong="H4480"\w* grief. \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* called \w on|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w* daily, \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*. \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w spread|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* hands \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* show wonders \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dead? \w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* departed spirits rise \w up|strong="H4480"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* praise \w you|strong="H3605"\w*? \qs Selah.\qs*

\w Is|strong="H6213"\w* \w your|strong="H6213"\w* loving kindness declared \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* grave? \w Or|strong="H4191"\w* \w your|strong="H6213"\w* faithfulness \w in|strong="H6213"\w* Destruction?

\w Are|strong="H6913"\w* \w your|strong="H5608"\w* wonders made known \w in|strong="H6913"\w* \w the|strong="H5608"\w* dark? \w Or|strong="H5608"\w* \w your|strong="H5608"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H2617"\w* \w in|strong="H6913"\w* \w the|strong="H5608"\w* land \w of|strong="H6913"\w* forgetfulness?

But \w to|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w*, \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* cried. \w In|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* morning, \w my|strong="H3045"\w* prayer comes \w before|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, why \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H1242"\w* reject \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul? Why \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H1242"\w* hide \w your|strong="H3068"\w* face \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6923"\w*?

\w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* afflicted \w and|strong="H3068"\w* ready \w to|strong="H3068"\w* die \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* youth \w up|strong="H4480"\w*. \w While|strong="H5315"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* suffer \w your|strong="H3068"\w* terrors, \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* distracted.
\w Your|strong="H5375"\w* fierce wrath has gone \w over|strong="H5375"\w* me. \w Your|strong="H5375"\w* terrors \w have|strong="H5375"\w* cut me \w off|strong="H5375"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w came|strong="H5674"\w* \w around|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* water \w all|strong="H5921"\w* day \w long|strong="H5921"\w*. \w They|strong="H5921"\w* completely \w engulfed|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* put lover \w and|strong="H3117"\w* friend \w far|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* friends \w into|strong="H5921"\w* darkness.
